Title: Stolen Tools
Description:
We have been plagued by gnolls raiding our supply caravans. They appear to be obsessed with the various engineering tools within. We cannot risk these violent raiders figuring out our specialized art! Also, these thefts have set our production schedule back more than I'd like to admit.

If you can retrieve some of the stolen engineering parts, we can get back on schedule.
ObjectivesText: Gather 20 Stolen Tools from the gnolls of the Dragon Isles for Dothenos of the Valdrakken Accord.
